sent.orig: The heavy rain affected the performance of the term greatly.
sent.trans: 4由于大雨，球队的表现(performance)受到了很大的影响。

sent.orig: Performance Assessment, also as performance evaluation, performance appraisal, performance appraisal, and so on.
sent.trans: 绩效考核又称绩效评估、绩效考评、考绩等等。

sent.orig: Performance management system has three parts: defining performance, measuring performance, and feeding back performance information.
sent.trans: 表现管理制度有三个部份：定义表现，测量表现、和饲养支持表现数据。

sent.orig: The performance index is market performance and management performance among the research of this text.
sent.trans: 在本文的研究中采取的企业并购绩效衡量指标是企业并购的市场绩效和经营绩效。

sent.orig: Superb heat preserving,insulating and energy-saving performance;superb sound insulating performance;superb anti-frosting and antifogging performance.
sent.trans: 卓越的保温、隔热和节能性能；卓越的隔音性能；卓越的防结霜和防结雾性能。
